page.title: 15The Village Hall
page.content:
The old village hall was destroyed by fire in l975. A stone building of modern design replaced it.
A Social Club meets there 3 times a week; they have a bar, a skittle alley and a pool table.
Other regular users are the Daddypuff Club for elderly people, and the Toddlers' Club for mothers with young children. (Daddypuff is an ancient nickname for Daglingworth).
The hall is also used for Yoga classes and roller skating sessions for children. The School uses it for parties and concerts and it is available for private hire for wedding parties, celebrations and meetings.
